<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Enum describing how instructions behave with respect to uniformity and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// divergence, to answer the question: if the same instruction is executed by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// two threads in a convergent set of threads, will its result value(s) be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// uniform, i.e. the same on both threads?</span></CodeLine>
